articles.description: MYRTLE CREEK — The Fly-In Pig Barbecue Competition returns to the Myrtle Creek airport and surrounding area this weekend with this year's theme of "Sampling the Northwest."
articles.title: 2nd annual Fly-In Pig BBQ Competition returns to Myrtle Creek

articles.author: ANDREW GRIFFIN The News-Review
articles.description: For Jose Luis Escobar Martinez and Diana Perez Hernandez, baking has been a constant in life, coming with them no matter where they moved. Now, the couple is making the next major leap in their culinary career as they open…
articles.title: Belens Bakery opens, brings artisanal Mexican bread and sweets to Roseburg

articles.author: The News-Review Staff
articles.description: Ballots for the Douglas County May Special District Election, in which residents vote for board members for various local special districts, are due by 8 p.m. May 20.

articles.title: May 15, 2025

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: The Roseburg Receiver will launch a continuous YouTube livestream starting June 1, replacing the current 12-hour feed format. This change aims to reduce confusion and provide a single, reliable link for listeners. All audio will still be archived on other platforms.
articles.title: Roseburg Receiver to Launch Continuous YouTube Livestream Starting June 1

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: OSP is seeking help identifying two individuals involved in the illegal killing of a wild steelhead near Amacher Park on the North Umpqua River. The suspects fled before being identified. Anyone with information is urged to contact OSP. Callers can remain anonymous.
articles.title: OSP Seeks Public's Help in Steelhead Poaching Case on North Umpqua River

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: The Roseburg Receiver Morning Scoop
articles.title: May 14, 2025

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Music on the Half Shell returns to Stewart Park in Roseburg with free concerts every Tuesday at 7 p.m., June 17–August 12. This year’s lineup features jazz, blues, bluegrass, soul, funk, and global acts. Bring a chair and enjoy live music under the summer sky. More info at halfshell.org.
articles.title: Music on the Half Shell Unveils 2025 Summer Concert Lineup in Roseburg
